data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Polotow, Daniele, Jocqué, Rudy (2016): Description of a new species of the Afrotropical spider genus Afroneutria (Araneae, Ctenidae). Zootaxa 4205 (4): 395-400, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4205.4.8|10 occurrences
